component_summary.name: InputOTP
component_summary.description: Light wrapper around the external 'input-otp' component to conform to project styling and provide subcomponents for slots and separators used in UI compositions.

components.name: InputOTP
components.description: Main OTP input wrapper that forwards ref and applies consistent container and input classes.

components.name: InputOTPGroup
components.description: Simple div wrapper used to group OTP inputs.

components.name: InputOTPSlot
components.description: Renders a slot cell from OTPInputContext showing character and fake caret when active.

components.name: InputOTPSeparator
components.description: Displays a separator (Dot icon) between groups.

notes: Thin adapter over external OTPInput library; minimal duplication risk.
